title: MOONVY Jewellery case
description: MOONVY Jewellery is owned by a high school student that is running on a low budget. The gpal of our project wast to help her appear more trustworthy to consumers, form relationships that create a more personal experience for the customers and finally gain extra traffic to the webshop in order to increase sales.
mywork: Every gorup member has contributed to most of the elements. I have mostly worked on the coded solution.

title: Game Characters web-app
undertitle: A small 3rd semester project with single page web application structure
description: The goal of this web-app is to to help users find the right game to play. As for a lot of people it matters a lot that the character they are playing seems interesting I decided to create an project that mostly focuses on that aspect. I have created a solution that helps to find user games with the playable character that fits their preferences
methodology:
I starded with testing my idea and doing desk research. I interviewed potential target audience in order to better understand their point view. The input I gained was enough was enough for me create a creative brief and user journey.
In the mockup I tried to include best solutions to user needs. After doing few think aloud tests I applied all of the necesery improvements and coded as much as I could in the short amount of time I had
mywork: This is a project fully developed by me.
